anathema: Punish another creature for cowardice, routinely avoid that which scares you
edict: Forgive cowards and offer them guidance, encourage others to test their mettle, face and learn from your fears
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Jaidz (Fearless Claw)](/Deities.aspx?ID=648)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 11

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Forgive cowards and offer them guidance, encourage others to test their mettle, face and learn from your fears

**Anathema** Punish another creature for cowardice, routinely avoid that which scares you

**Area of Concern**
Cowards, the untested, youths

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=398)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Introspection](/Domains.aspx?ID=110), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Tailwind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1711)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553)

- **7th**
[Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=1595)

</column>
name: Jaidz (Fearless Claw)
